an2.32-41:4.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an2.32-41:5.3: Asabbhi hetaṃ, bhikkhave, upaññātaṃ yadidaṃ akataññutā akataveditā.
an2.32-41:5.4: Kevalā esā, bhikkhave, asappurisabhūmi yadidaṃ akataññutā akataveditā. ()
an2.32-41:5.5: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, kataññū hoti katavedī.
an2.32-41:5.6: Sabbhi hetaṃ, bhikkhave, upaññātaṃ yadidaṃ kataññutā kataveditā.
an2.32-41:5.7: Kevalā esā, bhikkhave, sappurisabhūmi yadidaṃ kataññutā kataveditā”ti.
an2.32-41:7.4: Ekena, bhikkhave, aṃsena mātaraṃ parihareyya, ekena aṃsena pitaraṃ parihareyya vassasatāyuko vassasatajīvī so ca nesaṃ ucchādanaparimaddananhāpanasambāhanena.
an2.32-41:7.5: Te ca tattheva muttakarīsaṃ cajeyyuṃ, na tveva, bhikkhave, mātāpitūnaṃ kataṃ vā hoti paṭikataṃ vā.
an2.32-41:7.6: Imissā ca, bhikkhave, mahāpathaviyā pahūtarattaratanāya mātāpitaro issarādhipacce rajje patiṭṭhāpeyya, na tveva, bhikkhave, mātāpitūnaṃ kataṃ vā hoti paṭikataṃ vā.
an2.32-41:7.8: Bahukārā, bhikkhave, mātāpitaro puttānaṃ āpādakā posakā imassa lokassa dassetāro.
an2.32-41:7.9: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, mātāpitaro assaddhe saddhāsampadāya samādapeti niveseti patiṭṭhāpeti, dussīle sīlasampadāya samādapeti niveseti patiṭṭhāpeti, maccharī cāgasampadāya samādapeti niveseti patiṭṭhāpeti, duppaññe paññāsampadāya samādapeti niveseti patiṭṭhāpeti, ettāvatā kho, bhikkhave, mātāpitūnaṃ katañca hoti paṭikatañcā”ti.
an2.32-41:9.1: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an2.32-41:9.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ … pe … ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an2.32-41:9.6: “Yathākathaṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo kiriyavādī ca akiriyavādī cā”ti?
an2.32-41:10.1: “Akiriyaṃ kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, vadāmi kāyaduccaritassa vacīduccaritassa manoduccaritassa, anekavihitānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ akiriyaṃ vadāmi.
an2.32-41:10.2: Kiriyañca kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, vadāmi kāyasucaritassa vacīsucaritassa manosucaritassa, anekavihitānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ kiriyaṃ vadāmi.
an2.32-41:10.3: Evaṃ kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, kiriyavādī ca akiriyavādī cā”ti.
an2.32-41:11.1: “Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe … upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
an2.32-41:13.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an2.32-41:13.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an2.32-41:13.4: “kati nu kho, bhante, loke dakkhiṇeyyā, kattha ca dānaṃ dātabban”ti?
an2.32-41:13.7: Ime kho, gahapati, dve loke dakkhiṇeyyā, ettha ca dānaṃ dātabban”ti.
an2.32-41:14.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
an2.32-41:15.3: Te ujjubhūtā kāyena,
an2.32-41:17.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an2.32-41:17.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
an2.32-41:17.4: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an2.32-41:17.6: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
an2.32-41:17.9: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an2.32-41:17.10: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
an2.32-41:18.2: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti,* pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
an2.32-41:18.3: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an2.32-41:18.4: So tato cuto āgāmī hoti, āgantā itthattaṃ.
an2.32-41:18.5: Ayaṃ vuccati, āvuso, ajjhattasaṃyojano puggalo āgāmī hoti, āgantā itthattaṃ.
an2.32-41:19.2: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
an2.32-41:19.3: So aññataraṃ santaṃ cetovimuttiṃ upasampajja viharati.
an2.32-41:19.4: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an2.32-41:19.5: So tato cuto anāgāmī hoti, anāgantā itthattaṃ.
an2.32-41:19.6: Ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, bahiddhāsaṃyojano puggalo anāgāmī hoti, anāgantā itthattaṃ.
an2.32-41:20.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti … pe … samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
an2.32-41:20.2: So kāmānaṃyeva nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
an2.32-41:20.3: So bhavānaṃyeva nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
an2.32-41:20.6: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an2.32-41:20.7: So tato cuto anāgāmī hoti, anāgantā itthattaṃ.
an2.32-41:20.8: Ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, bahiddhāsaṃyojano puggalo anāgāmī hoti, anāgantā itthattan”ti.
an2.32-41:21.1: Atha kho sambahulā samacittā devatā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an2.32-41:21.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
an2.32-41:21.4: “eso, bhante, āyasmā sāriputto pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhattasaṃyojanañca puggalaṃ deseti bahiddhāsaṃyojanañca.
an2.32-41:21.6: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
an2.32-41:21.9: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
an2.32-41:21.11: jetavane antarahito pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde āyasmato sāriputtassa sammukhe pāturahosi.
an2.32-41:21.13: Āyasmāpi kho sāriputto bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an2.32-41:21.14: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an2.32-41:22.1: “Idha, sāriputta, sambahulā samacittā devatā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an2.32-41:22.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho, sāriputta, tā devatā maṃ etadavocuṃ:
an2.32-41:22.4: ‘eso, bhante, āyasmā sāriputto pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhattasaṃyojanañca puggalaṃ deseti bahiddhāsaṃyojanañca.
an2.32-41:22.6: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā yena āyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’ti.
an2.32-41:22.7: Tā kho pana, sāriputta, devatā dasapi hutvā vīsampi hutvā tiṃsampi hutvā cattālīsampi hutvā paññāsampi hutvā saṭṭhipi hutvā āraggakoṭinitudanamattepi tiṭṭhanti, na ca aññamaññaṃ byābādhenti.
an2.32-41:22.8: Siyā kho pana, sāriputta, evamassa:
an2.32-41:22.9: ‘tattha nūna tāsaṃ devatānaṃ tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ yena tā devatā dasapi hutvā vīsampi hutvā tiṃsampi hutvā cattālīsampi hutvā paññāsampi hutvā saṭṭhipi hutvā āraggakoṭinitudanamattepi tiṭṭhanti na ca aññamaññaṃ byābādhentī’ti.
an2.32-41:22.10: Na kho panetaṃ, sāriputta, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an2.32-41:22.11: Idheva kho, sāriputta, tāsaṃ devatānaṃ tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ, yena tā devatā dasapi hutvā … pe … na ca aññamaññaṃ byābādhenti.
an2.32-41:22.15: ‘Santindriyānañhi vo, sāriputta, santamānasānaṃ santaṃyeva kāyakammaṃ bhavissati santaṃ vacīkammaṃ santaṃ manokammaṃ.
an2.32-41:22.18: Anassuṃ kho, sāriputta, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā ye imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ nāssosun’”ti.
an2.32-41:24.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā mahākaccāno varaṇāyaṃ viharati bhaddasāritīre.
an2.32-41:24.3: Atha kho ārāmadaṇḍo brāhmaṇo yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami;
an2.32-41:24.5: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an2.32-41:24.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho ārāmadaṇḍo brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etadavoca:
an2.32-41:24.7: “ko nu kho, bho kaccāna, hetu ko paccayo yena khattiyāpi khattiyehi vivadanti, brāhmaṇāpi brāhmaṇehi vivadanti, gahapatikāpi gahapatikehi vivadantī”ti?
an2.32-41:24.8: “Kāmarāgābhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyuṭṭhānajjhosānahetu kho, brāhmaṇa, khattiyāpi khattiyehi vivadanti, brāhmaṇāpi brāhmaṇehi vivadanti, gahapatikāpi gahapatikehi vivadantī”ti.
an2.32-41:25.1: “Ko pana, bho kaccāna, hetu ko paccayo yena samaṇāpi samaṇehi vivadantī”ti?
an2.32-41:26.1: “Atthi pana, bho kaccāna, koci lokasmiṃ yo imañceva kāmarāgābhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyuṭṭhānajjhosānaṃ samatikkanto, imañca diṭṭhirāgābhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyuṭṭhānajjhosānaṃ samatikkanto”ti?
an2.32-41:26.2: “Atthi, brāhmaṇa, lokasmiṃ yo imañceva kāmarāgābhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyuṭṭhānajjhosānaṃ samatikkanto, imañca diṭṭhirāgābhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyuṭṭhānajjhosānaṃ samatikkanto”ti.
an2.32-41:27.1: “Ko pana so, bho kaccāna, lokasmiṃ yo imañceva kāmarāgābhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyuṭṭhānajjhosānaṃ samatikkanto, imañca diṭṭhirāgābhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyuṭṭhānajjhosānaṃ samatikkanto”ti?
an2.32-41:27.2: “Atthi, brāhmaṇa, puratthimesu janapadesu sāvatthī nāma nagaraṃ.
an2.32-41:27.3: Tattha so bhagavā etarahi viharati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho.
an2.32-41:27.4: So hi, brāhmaṇa, bhagavā imañceva kāmarāgābhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyuṭṭhānajjhosānaṃ samatikkanto, imañca diṭṭhirāgābhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyuṭṭhānajjhosānaṃ samatikkanto”ti.
an2.32-41:28.1: Evaṃ vutte, ārāmadaṇḍo brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā dakkhiṇaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ pathaviyaṃ nihantvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
an2.32-41:32.1: Yo hi so bhagavā imañceva kāmarāgābhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyuṭṭhānajjhosānaṃ samatikkanto, imañca diṭṭhirāgābhinivesavinibandhapaligedhapariyuṭṭhānajjhosānaṃ samatikkanto”ti.
an2.32-41:33.2: Seyyathāpi, bho kaccāna, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya;
an2.32-41:33.5: evamevaṃ bhotā kaccānena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
an2.32-41:33.6: Esāhaṃ, bho kaccāna, taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
an2.32-41:33.7: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ kaccāno dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
an2.32-41:35.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā mahākaccāno madhurāyaṃ viharati gundāvane.
an2.32-41:35.2: Atha kho kandarāyano brāhmaṇo yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami;
an2.32-41:35.3: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahākaccānena saddhiṃ … pe … ekamantaṃ nisinno kho kandarāyano brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etadavoca:
an2.32-41:35.4: “sutaṃ metaṃ, bho kaccāna, ‘na samaṇo kaccāno brāhmaṇe jiṇṇe vuddhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivādeti vā paccuṭṭheti vā āsanena vā nimantetī’ti.
an2.32-41:35.6: Na hi bhavaṃ kaccāno brāhmaṇe jiṇṇe vuddhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivādeti vā paccuṭṭheti vā āsanena vā nimanteti.
an2.32-41:36.1: “Atthi, brāhmaṇa, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena vuddhabhūmi ca akkhātā daharabhūmi ca.
an2.32-41:36.2: Vuddho cepi, brāhmaṇa, hoti āsītiko vā nāvutiko vā vassasatiko vā jātiyā, so ca kāme paribhuñjati kāmamajjhāvasati kāmapariḷāhena pariḍayhati kāmavitakkehi khajjati kāmapariyesanāya ussuko.
an2.32-41:36.3: Atha kho so bālo na therotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
an2.32-41:36.4: Daharo cepi, brāhmaṇa, hoti yuvā susukāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato paṭhamena vayasā.
an2.32-41:36.5: So ca na kāme paribhuñjati na kāmamajjhāvasati, na kāmapariḷāhena pariḍayhati, na kāmavitakkehi khajjati, na kāmapariyesanāya ussuko.
an2.32-41:36.6: Atha kho so paṇḍito therotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”ti.
an2.32-41:37.1: Evaṃ vutte, kandarāyano brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā daharānaṃ sataṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde sirasā vandati:
an2.32-41:38.1: “Abhikkantaṃ, bho kaccāna … pe … upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ kaccāno dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
an2.32-41:40.1: “Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye corā balavanto honti, rājāno tasmiṃ samaye dubbalā honti.
an2.32-41:40.2: Tasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye rañño na phāsu hoti atiyātuṃ vā niyyātuṃ vā paccantime vā janapade anusaññātuṃ.
an2.32-41:40.3: Brāhmaṇagahapatikānampi tasmiṃ samaye na phāsu hoti atiyātuṃ vā niyyātuṃ vā bāhirāni vā kammantāni paṭivekkhituṃ.
an2.32-41:40.4: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye pāpabhikkhū balavanto honti, pesalā bhikkhū tasmiṃ samaye dubbalā honti.
an2.32-41:40.5: Tasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye pesalā bhikkhū tuṇhībhūtā tuṇhībhūtāva saṃghamajjhe saṅkasāyanti paccantime vā janapade acchanti.
an2.32-41:40.6: Tayidaṃ, bhikkhave, hoti bahujanāhitāya bahujanāsukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an2.32-41:41.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye rājāno balavanto honti, corā tasmiṃ samaye dubbalā honti.
an2.32-41:41.2: Tasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye rañño phāsu hoti atiyātuṃ vā niyyātuṃ vā paccantime vā janapade anusaññātuṃ.
an2.32-41:41.3: Brāhmaṇagahapatikānampi tasmiṃ samaye phāsu hoti atiyātuṃ vā niyyātuṃ vā bāhirāni vā kammantāni paṭivekkhituṃ.
an2.32-41:41.4: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye pesalā bhikkhū balavanto honti, pāpabhikkhū tasmiṃ samaye dubbalā honti.
an2.32-41:41.5: Tasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye pāpabhikkhū tuṇhībhūtā tuṇhībhūtāva saṃghamajjhe saṅkasāyanti, yena vā pana tena pakkamanti.
an2.32-41:41.6: Tayidaṃ, bhikkhave, hoti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan”ti.
an2.32-41:43.1: “Dvinnāhaṃ, bhikkhave, micchāpaṭipattiṃ na vaṇṇemi, gihissa vā pabbajitassa vā.
an2.32-41:43.2: Gihī vā, bhikkhave, pabbajito vā micchāpaṭipanno micchāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu na ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalaṃ.
an2.32-41:44.1: * Dvinnāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sammāpaṭipattiṃ vaṇṇemi, gihissa vā pabbajitassa vā.
an2.32-41:44.2: Gihī vā, bhikkhave, pabbajito vā sammāpaṭipanno sammāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalan”ti.
an2.32-41:46.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū duggahitehi suttantehi byañjanappatirūpakehi atthañca dhammañca paṭibāhanti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanāhitāya paṭipannā bahujanāsukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an2.32-41:46.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū apuññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ antaradhāpenti.
an2.32-41:47.1: Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū suggahitehi suttantehi byañjanappatirūpakehi atthañca dhammañca anulomenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an2.32-41:47.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī”ti.
